mapper.select: SELECT notice_id AS noticeId, notice_title AS noticeTitle, notice_content AS noticeContent, (notice_created_at AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AS noticeCreatedAt, (notice_updated_at AT TIME ZONE 'UTC') AS noticeUpdatedAt -- notice_created_at AS noticeCreatedAt, -- notice_updated_at AS noticeUpdatedAt FROM notice ORDER BY notice_created_at DESC LIMIT #{size} OFFSET #{offset}
